TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit VisualStyleElement/ExplorerBar/SpecialGroupCollapse extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides objects for each state of the collapse button of a special group of items in the Explorer Bar. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Each property of the VisualStyleElement.ExplorerBar.SpecialGroupCollapse class gets a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> for a different state of the collapse button of a special group of items in the Explorer Bar, such as the **Music Tasks** group in Windows Explorer.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ExplorerBar.SpecialGroupCollapse.Normal%2A> property. To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form. Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElementExplorerBarSpecialGroupCollapse1` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
[!code-cs[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#159](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/ba669638-bd29-4bed-a555-_1.cs)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#159](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/ba669638-bd29-4bed-a555-_1.vb)]

Docs.summary: Gets a visual style element that represents a hot collapse button of a special group of items in the Explorer Bar.
Docs.value: A that represents a hot collapse button.

remarks.format:
## Remarks You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the Hot property to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the Hot property. To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form. Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElementExplorerBarSpecialGroupCollapse2` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
[!code-cs[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#160](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/de3f4f20-2ad8-4cb2-90ec-_1.cs)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#160](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/de3f4f20-2ad8-4cb2-90ec-_1.vb)]

Docs.summary: Gets a visual style element that represents a normal collapse button of a special group of items in the Explorer Bar.
Docs.value: A that represents a normal collapse button.

remarks.format:
## Remarks You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the Normal property to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the Normal property. To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form. Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElementExplorerBarSpecialGroupCollapse1` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
[!code-cs[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#159](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/f97dadda-ca25-47eb-8e3b-_1.cs)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#159](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/f97dadda-ca25-47eb-8e3b-_1.vb)]

Docs.summary: Gets a visual style element that represents a pressed collapse button of a special group of items in the Explorer Bar.
Docs.value: A that represents a pressed collapse button.

remarks.format:
## Remarks You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the Pressed property to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the Pressed property. To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form. Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElementExplorerBarSpecialGroupCollapse3` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
